---
title: "Bar Charts"
---

```{r Libs, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(chartjs)
library(magrittr)
```

## Dodged bar charts

```{r Dodged bar charts, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE}
chartjs(mtcars, mpg, qsec, labels = row.names(mtcars)) %>% 
  cjsBar
```

## Stacked bar charts

```{r Stacked bar charts, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE}
chartjs(mtcars, mpg, qsec, labels = row.names(mtcars)) %>% 
  cjsBar(stacked = TRUE)
```
